name: Drug Mafia - Weed Pawn Shop
description:
You will start from scratch in this business;
- Build your reputation with suppliers
- Secure orders from clients across whole town
- Buy bars and hotels and expand your empire
- Hire people, do partnerships and never uncover your secrets
- Avoid cops and don't ever bring them to your apartment
- Bribe cops and avoid going to jail
- Grow your empire and become drug lord
